name: Brazilian Chicken Wings (Frango À Passarinho) Recipe by Tasty
description: Here's what you need: chicken wings, garlic, salt, pepper, lime juice, flour, oil, lime wedge, garlic
recipeIngredient: Lime wedges and fried chopped garlic to serve
recipeInstructionSteps: Combine the chicken with the garlic, salt, pepper, and lime juice in a bowl until evenly coated. Cover with cling film and refrigerate for about an hour.
Dip each chicken wing in the flour, shaking off excess.
Heat oil in a large pot to about 375°F.
Fry half of the chicken wings at a time until dark golden brown. The oil temperature will drop to about 350°F.
Serve with lime wedges and fried garlic.
